info.author: Daniel Strobl
Caroline Friedel
info.description: Performs spliced RNA-seq read mapping using HISAT2.
info.paperDescription: Sequencing reads were mapped using HISAT2 (version (%SOFTWARE_VERSION%)) [Kim D, Langmead B, Salzberg SL. HISAT: a fast spliced aligner with low memory requirements. Nat Methods. 2015 Apr;12(4):357-60].

param.name: unpaired
param.description: Files with unpaired reads. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2).

param.name: s
param.description: skip the first <int> reads/pairs in the input (none)

param.name: u
param.description: stop after first <int> reads/pairs (no limit)

param.name: trim5
param.description: trim <int> bases from 5'/left end of reads (0)

param.name: trim3
param.description: trim <int> bases from 3'/right end of reads (0)

param.name: nceil
param.description: func for max # non-A/C/G/Ts permitted in aln (L,0,0.15)

param.name: pencansplice
param.description: penalty for a canonical splice site (0)

param.name: pennoncansplice
param.description: penalty for a non-canonical splice site (12)

param.name: pencanintronlen
param.description: penalty for long introns (G,-8,1) with canonical splice sites

param.name: pennoncanintronlen
param.description: penalty for long introns (G,-8,1) with noncanonical splice sites

param.name: minintronlen
param.description: minimum intron length (20)

param.name: maxintronlen
param.description: maximum intron length (500000)

param.name: knownsplicesiteinfile
param.description: provide a list of known splice sites

param.name: novelsplicesiteoutfile
param.description: report a list of splice sites

param.name: rnastrandness
param.description: Specify strand-specific information (unstranded)

param.name: ma
param.description: match bonus (0 for --end-to-end, 2 for --local)

param.name: mp
param.description: max and min penalties for mismatch; lower qual = lower penalty <6,2>

param.name: sp
param.description: max and min penalties for soft-clipping; lower qual = lower penalty <2,1>

param.name: np
param.description: penalty for non-A/C/G/Ts in read/ref (1)

param.name: rdg
param.description: read gap open, extend penalties (5,3)

param.name: rfg
param.description: reference gap open, extend penalties (5,3)

param.name: scoremin
param.description: min acceptable alignment score w/r/t read length (L,0.0,-0.2)

param.name: k
param.description: report up to <int> alns per read; MAPQ not meaningful

param.name: a
param.description: report all alignments; very slow, MAPQ not meaningful

param.name: un
param.description: write unpaired reads that didn't align to <path>

param.name: al
param.description: write unpaired reads that aligned at least once to <path>

param.name: unconc
param.description: write pairs that didn't align concordantly to <path>

param.name: alconc
param.description: write pairs that aligned concordantly at least once to <path>

param.name: metfile
param.description: send metrics to file at <path> (off)

param.name: met
param.description: report internal counters & metrics every <int> secs (1)

param.name: rgid
param.description: set read group id, reflected in @RG line and RG:Z: opt field

param.name: rg
param.description: add <text> (\"lab:value\") to @RG line of SAM header.

param.name: offrate
param.description: override offrate of index; must be >= index's offrate

param.name: threads
param.description: number of alignment threads to launch (1)

param.name: seed
param.description: seed for random number generator (0)

param.name: index
param.description: Index filename prefix (minus trailing .X.ht2)

param.name: paired1
param.description: Files with #1 mates, paired with files in <m2>. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2).

param.name: paired2
param.description: Files with #2 mates, paired with files in <m1>. Could be gzip'ed (extension: .gz) or bzip2'ed (extension: .bz2).

param.name: output
param.description: File for SAM output (default: stdout)

param.name: fastq
param.description: query input files are FASTQ .fq/.fastq (default)

param.name: qseq
param.description: query input files are in Illumina's qseq format

param.name: fasta
param.description: query input files are (multi-)FASTA .fa/.mfa

param.name: raw
param.description: query input files are raw one-sequence-per-line

param.name: c
param.description: paired1, paired2, unpaired are sequences themselves, not files

param.name: phred33
param.description: qualities are Phred+33 (default)

param.name: phred64
param.description: qualities are Phred+64

param.name: intquals
param.description: qualities encoded as space-delimited integers

param.name: ignorequals
param.description: treat all quality values as 30 on Phred scale (off)

param.name: nofw
param.description: do not align forward (original) version of read (off)

param.name: norc
param.description: do not align reverse-complement version of read (off)

param.name: novelsplicesiteinfile
param.description: provide a list of novel splice sites

param.name: notempsplicesite
param.description: disable the use of splice sites found

param.name: nosplicedalignment
param.description: disable spliced alignment

param.name: tmo
param.description: Reports only those alignments within known transcriptome

param.name: dta
param.description: Reports alignments tailored for transcript assemblers

param.name: dtacufflinks
param.description: Reports alignments tailored specifically for cufflinks

param.name: fr
param.description: -1, -2 mates align fw/rev

param.name: nomixed
param.description: suppress unpaired alignments for paired reads

param.name: nodiscordant
param.description: suppress discordant alignments for paired reads

param.name: t
param.description: print wall-clock time taken by search phases

param.name: quiet
param.description: print nothing to stderr except serious errors

param.name: metstderr
param.description: send metrics to stderr (off)

param.name: nohead
param.description: supppress header lines, i.e. lines starting with @

param.name: nosq
param.description: supppress @SQ header lines

param.name: omitsecseq
param.description: put '*' in SEQ and QUAL fields for secondary alignments.

param.name: reorder
param.description: force SAM output order to match order of input reads

param.name: mm
param.description: use memory-mapped I/O for index; many 'bowtie's can share

param.name: qcfilter
param.description: filter out reads that are bad according to QSEQ filter

param.name: nondeterministic
param.description: seed rand. gen. arbitrarily instead of using read attributes

param.name: removechrname
param.description: remove 'chr' from reference names in alignment

param.name: addchrname
param.description: add 'chr' to reference names in alignment

param.name: rf
param.description: -1, -2 mates align rev/fw

param.name: ff
param.description: -1, -2 mates align fw/fw
